name: TAD: That Alien Dude
description: TAD: That Alien Dude is a retro RPG that takes you back in time to a world of analog cartoon franchises, sugary breakfast cereals, a thriving music industry, and die-cut comic book covers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: AMD A Series Quad-Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: On Board Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: Soundblaster
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: 3.4 Ghz Intel Core i5-4670 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 660+ Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: Soundblaster
